title: Lz4 compression option for the /export handler and CloudSolrStream

comments.author: Joel Bernstein
comments.content:
The primary driver for this is SOLR-8888, where compression of the edges being streamed to the worker node is a massive performance win. But this will also come in handy in any streaming scenario where the network is the bottleneck.

Adrien Grand, I'm interested in using https://github.com/jpountz/lz4-java. Let me know if you see any issues with adding this as a Solr dependancy.
